DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the effect of participating in the interactive hypertension education program of the German Hypertension League (DHLÂ©) "My blood pressure - OK!" on office systolic blood pressure.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of a Hypertension Education Program
DOC.criteria: > 21 years of age Primary arterial hypertension Office blood pressure between 140/90 mmHg and 160/100 mmHg Participation in another clinical study Unstable clinical condition Secondary arterial hypertension Dementia Major disability (modified RankinScale > 4) Severe chronic kidney disease (serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL or estimated glomerular filtration rate < 40 ml/min/1.73m2) Liver disease including history of hepatic encephalopathy, esophageal varices or portacaval shunt History of gastrointestinal operation or disease with a potential influence on drug absorption Allergy or other contraindications against drugs given during the study History of noncompliance
